typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Ballot.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: Create a new ballot with $(_numProposals) different proposals.

Give $(toVoter) the right to vote on this ballot.
 May only be called by $(chairperson).
nodes.name: register

methods.constructor: Create a new ballot with $(_numProposals) different proposals.
